targets.rawSql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms), 2) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code<400 THEN 1 END)*100.0/COUNT(*), 2) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';
SELECT ROUND(COUNT(*)/5.0, 2) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '5 minutes';

SELECT date_trunc('minute', created_at) as time, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_ms, ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms), 2) as p50, ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms), 2) as p95, ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms), 2) as p99 FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '2 hours' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) as requests, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_ms, ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms), 2) as p95_ms, ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code<400 THEN 1 END)*100.0/COUNT(*), 2) as success_rate FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' GROUP BY service_name ORDER BY requests DESC;

SELECT CASE WHEN path LIKE '/api/v1/nin/%' THEN 'NIN Verification' WHEN path LIKE '/api/v1/bvn/%' THEN 'BVN Verification' WHEN path LIKE '/api/v1/sms/%' THEN 'SMS Service' WHEN path LIKE '/api/v1/llm/%' THEN 'AI Service' ELSE 'Other' END as service, COUNT(*) as requests, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_response_ms, ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN duration_ms<=2000 THEN 1 END)*100.0/COUNT(*), 2) as sla_compliance_pct FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND path NOT LIKE '/health%' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY requests DESC;
SELECT date_trunc('minute', created_at) as time, service_name, COUNT(*) as requests FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '2 hours' GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1;
